data.title: Miron-Wilson Funeral Home, Cremation and Reception Centre
data.meta_description: We know the loss of a loved with is very difficult. At Miron Wilson Funeral Home and Cremation Centre our experienced, compassionate staff will “take you by the hand” and help you with the hundreds of decisions that need to be made to arrange the service that your loved one deserves
